alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Oldham; Shelby (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Oldham, northwestern Shelby and Jefferson Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pleasure Ridge Park, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fairdale around 555 PM EDT. Louisville, Shively, Audubon Park, Parkway Village, Hollyvilla, South Park View and Okolona around 600 PM EDT. West Buechel, Watterson Park, Lynnview, Seneca Gardens, Strathmoor Village, Rolling Fields, Norbourne Estates, Kingsley, Poplar Hills and Strathmoor Manor around 605 PM EDT. Jeffersontown, St. Matthews, Lyndon, Hurstbourne, Graymoor-Devondale, Windy Hills, Hurstbourne Acres, St. Regis Park, Beechwood Village and Rolling Hills around 610 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Middletown, Douglass Hills, Anchorage, Blue Ridge Manor, Woodland Hills, Creekside, Sycamore, Hickory Hill and Keeneland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
